snippet.title: Polismos - City showcase | Historical city builder
snippet.description:
Polismos is an upcoming city building game set in ancient Greece.
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2745040/Polismos/

Polismos is a city builder set in ancient Greece. To ensure your city's prosperity you will need to care for your people, trade valuable resources, enact wise policies, and maybe even dominate other cities. 

Turn your city into a thriving metropolis by balancing both internal governance and external diplomacy. Build magnificent structures, unlock groundbreaking innovations, and navigate a complex economic system - the city's fate lay in your hands.
